content.value:
The Morazul has adequate rooms, each with high-definition satellite TV, Smart Tv, private bathroom with instant hot water, hotel mattresses and bedding. It also has social areas including lobby, restaurant and external garden. It also has a 24-hour reception, concierge, room service and parking at no additional cost.

Offering a restaurant and a garden, Hotel Morazul is located in Bogotá, 1 km from T Zone and 2.3 km from Campin Coliseum. Free WiFi access and private parkin g are available on site. A daily breakfast is served.

All of the simple yet elegant rooms at Morazul Hotel feature a flat-screen cable TV and a wardrobe. All private facilities are private and include a shower. Some units include views of the surroundings. Bed linens and towels are provided.

description.description: Welcome to Hotel Morazul, an incredible Boutique located north of the city of Bogotá in a strategic area for those who are looking for recreation, as for those who travel for business. It is located 550 meters from the high tech center / Unilago, 688 meters from the shopping center on Avenida Chile, 828 meters from Zona T and Andino shopping center, 741 meters from the Atlantis shopping center, among other recognized places
